KnowledgeBase.Title: Example Symbol compareEQ 002
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: compare compareNE compareGT compareGE compareLT compareLE

Example.Description: These examples use the compareEQ function to compare two Symbols and return the Boolean value, true or false. In these examples, lowercase characters are compared as against uppercase characters of the Symbols being compared. In the ASCII table, uppercase characters are represented by 65 to 90 while lowercase characters are represented by 97 to 122. Using this table, lowercase characters have greater value than uppercase characters.

Syntax.Note: The characters of the Symbols are not equal.
